description: Warm up with this creamy potato soup that's perfect for chilly evenings. Its rich flavors and comforting texture make it a family favorite. Try this recipe tonight for a cozy meal!
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped onion and garlic, sautÃ© until translucent.
Add diced potatoes and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth. Stir in heavy cream and season with salt and pepper.
tips: For the best results, use starchy potatoes like Russets for a creamy texture. Adjust seasoning to your taste.
